Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service.job

Class JobApplicationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.buffettinc.hrms.service.job.JobApplicationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
JobApplicationService
@Service public class JobApplicationServiceImpl extends Object implements JobApplicationService
This class is the implementation of the JobApplicationService interface for handling job applications at Buffett Inc.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5
